channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole at junction of Two Hedges Road & New Road. Catch it every time cars turn into a two Hedges Ro, 28th January
item.description:
Pot hole has been here for at least 2 weeks. You can’t help but hit it when turning from New Road into Two Hedges Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 New Road, Woodmancote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large deep potholes, 28th January
item.description:
Hi 2 large deep pot holes one either side of road and these are getting worse day by day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Springbank Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety issue along footpath., 27th January
item.description:
The disabled footpath runs alongside the Isbourne river.There is an area which is under five foot from the path and the river has caused the bank to crumble. There is no warning signage or fencing. There is increased use at present particularly by people with young children. I am concerned that there will be an accident.it is a long drop into a fast moving river.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Kenulf Road, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diversion signs, 27th January
item.description:
Closure of A46 (Painswick road) has a proliferation of “road closed” “diversion” signs which are not at all clear and appear to be covering more than one diversion. I witnessed an accident where one vehicle was in collision with another one that had stopped to read/understand the diversion signs. Can’t it be made better and clearer?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Parcel 1718 Painswick Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Throwing food waste over the road every day which is attracting rats in avon road, 27th January
item.description:
A young lad called Conner has fixation on feeding the birds and throws food waste all over the road. Hes been told about it but nothing ever happens other than a police visit. It's making the local cats sick and attracting rats. Cars are sliding on it as they are turning and nearly losing control towards the concrete end

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Avon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole forming, 27th January
item.description:
It’s under the bridge, in lane 1, left side, you can’t see it in the dark. Just as you get onto the slip road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement dangerous and slabs damaged, 26th January
item.description:
Pavement and verges damaged and totally wrecked by occupant of 142 continually driving mini buses across the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 142 Cromwell Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad pothole, 26th January
item.description:
It has busted a wheel and tyre on my car. Watch out for it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drone, 25th January
item.description:
Drone usage in the area. A drone has been seen and heard flying over the gardens and houses of the residents of Guan Road. Please can a police report be filed as a threat to privacy, potential damage to vehicals and could even land on someone’s head. A drone should not be flown within 150m of a built up area BY LAW!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 64 Guan Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded wardrobe left on road, 24th January
item.description:
Hi, someone's left a wardrobe out by Park Campus - it's been out for several weeks and it's deteriorated a lot in recent bad weather. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Broadlands Lodge, 56 The Park, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree growing over footpath, 24th January
item.description:
Pavement on corner of Waterloo Street and Compton Road blocked by large conifer in garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Waterloo Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree grown over footpath, 24th January
item.description:
Pavement on corner of Waterloo Street and Compton Road blocked by large conifer in garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Waterloo Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Trolly in the river, 24th January
item.description:
Trolly in the river running alongside Arle Avenue. Another discarded on Arle Avenue next to the wall with the graffiti just past Lower Mill Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57 Arle Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is crumbling away, 23rd January
item.description:
Since the bridge has been shut and the traffic all goes down Hayden Lane the entire edges of the lane are crumbling away making it costly and dangerous for vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Waldesruh Hayden Lane, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rusting Lampost, 23rd January
item.description:
The street lamp at corner of Glensanda Court is rusting particularly badly and is in need of painting . Can I his be rectified please ? Glos Highways have already agreed to deep clean Montpellier Spa Rd ( on which this lampost is sited ) as it is currently a major eyesore and painting this lampost would also help to improve the visual state of the road . Sir Rob Wright Chairman Glensanda Court Residents Association Chairman Friends of Montpellier Gardens

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Glensanda Court Montpellier Spa Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People in flats disposing of cigarette butts out the window, 23rd January
item.description:
Piles of cigarette butts outside the flat windows where they are throwing them out the window instead of disposing of them correcting. Smells disgusting and looks awful. They are littered on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Honeysuckle Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge Potholes and loose tarmac, 23rd January
item.description:
Potholes all over this stretch of road and making it very dangerous to walk or cycle down here as cars swerve to avoid potholes. I was nearly knocked off my bike as a car tried to swerve to avoid a huge pothole. They have been getting worse due to higher traffic from the new estate. Needs to be resurfaced. Been getting worse for the last year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Berries Farm Lane, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign damaged on corner of Naunton Lane and Naunton Way, 22nd January
item.description:
The traffic priority sign on the corner of Naunton Lane and Naunton Way has been knocked by passing traffic several times. It is now leaning, and one of the signs has slipped down the pole and now presents an obstruction and tripping hazard for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Naunton Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in carriageway, 21st January
item.description:
Large and deep pothole in the carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Littledown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped sign, 21st January
item.description:
Needs collecting

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 101 Pittville Lawn, Cheltenham
